title: Manage Change Control for an SOP
description: A process owner needs to update a Standard Operating Procedure (SOP) and must manage the change through a formal change control process.

tasks.description: Initiate a new change control record in the quality management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a new change control record, describing the reason for the change.

tasks.description: Attach the redlined version of the SOP to the change control record.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully uploads the revised SOP.

tasks.description: Route the change control record for review and approval by the required stakeholders (e.g., department head, QA).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent routes the record for electronic signature.

tasks.description: Once approved, make the new version of the SOP effective and obsolete the old version.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent updates the SOP status in the document management system and triggers retraining notifications.
